Text: This is a great, and I would say essential, app.  I have bought it for both of my macs.  I would recommend buying it though as it's features make it more than worth the purchase price and considering that this is the app that keeps me safe I didn't even think about running it without paying for it.  I was amazed at how many of my programs wanted to talk to someone over the net.
i also bought this program. well worth it.
